title: Learning objectives
description: Obtain the skills and knowledge necessary to address the following questions:

children.value: Obtain the skills and knowledge necessary to address the following questions:
Why do researchers write software themselves?

plainText:
---
title: Learning objectives
type: info
order: 0
---

Obtain the skills and knowledge necessary to address the following questions:
- Why do researchers write software themselves?
- What problems arise because of this?
- What initiatives exist to tackle these issues?
